descriptions.title: An Overview of the John Bellezza TILE Expedition
descriptions.content: In the winter of 2006,  John Belleza conducted the four-week long Tibet Ice Lakes Expedition (TILE) in order to reach six islands in four different lakes. By traversing the frozen surfaces of the lakes, he was able to survey se mo do (gnam mtsho), do rta sga and do dril bu (da rog mtsho), mtsho do (ngang la ring mtsho), and do ser and do smug (la ngag mtsho).
